lines: Hwɛ 'nuonyam bi a ɛrepue Wɔ yɛn ani so ha!
Asase ne po ny'naa atwam, Ͻne kan soro no,
Ͻne kan soro no, Ͻne kan soro no,
Asase ne po ny'naa atwan Ͻne kan soro no.
O, ɛbɛyɛ 'nigye, 'nigye, 'nigye,
O, ɛbɛyɛ 'nigye;
B're a yɛrentetewm' bio,
B're a yɛrentetewm' bio wɔ
Kanaan mpoano hɔ;
Yɛbɛtra Yesu nan ase,
B're a yɛrentetewm' bio.
Abɔfo no di ah'rusi, Na dɔm no to dwom sɛ,
Adasamma, monhwɛ mo Hen' A ɔresian nō agua,
A ɔresian nō agua, A ɔresian nō agua,
Adasamma, monhwɛ mo Hen' A ɔresian nō agua.
N'ankasa nsa bɛpopa wɔn Aniwam nusu ny'naa;
Na yaw, apini, suro ne Wu ankasa betwam,
Wų ankasa betwam, Wu ankasa betwam;
Na yaw, apini, suro ne Wu ankasa betwam,
'Gyenkwa pa, enkosi da bɛn Na saa dɔn yi bɛteɛn?
Mm're, tu mm'rika na kɔ ntɛmntem
Kɔfa da pa no bra,
Kɔfa da pa no bra, Kɔfa da pa no bra;
Mm're, tu mm'rika na kɔ ntɛmntem
Kɔfa da pa no bra.
